import React,{ useState,useEffect} from 'react' import "../App.css" import { Button } from '@material-ui/core' import ProductForms from "./Productform.js" function Home() { const [total, setTotal] = useState([]); console.log(farmer) const btnstyle={margin:'8px 0'} useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:9292/total`) .then(response => response.json()) .then((data) => { setTotal(data) }) }, []) return ( <>
{farmer.map((farmer) => ( {farmer.products.map((pro)=> <> )} ))}
Name Tel Location Product Category Quantity (Kg) Price
{farmer.name} {farmer.tel} {farmer.location}{pro.name} {pro.category.name} {pro.quantity} {pro.price}
); } export default Home
